Fact: Rusters are the most powerful race in the universe.
Rust Belt ships are grungy but durable, and often carry more energy weapons than you'd find on a Low Tech hull.
[Commissioned Crews] Rusters are an unruly lot, but there's no denying that they know how to fix up a ship.
Not only do Heavy Illuminators allow you to boost the reach of short-ranged weapons, they also deal decent damage in their own right.
Do not underestimate the humble Belt Blaster - it has a long reach, and hits hard.
Debris Belts hide all kinds of things - if you're not looking for trouble it may be best to sneak through.
